name: The Iris of Asilia
description:
Welcome to the all seen Iris of Asilia.

Try to smash the buttons as much as possible! No timer, no enemies, no bugs...

Just you and the game.

~CONTROLS?~

Point and click on the buttons.

~STRATEGY?~
Different buttons do different things. Your're smart(I guess), you can figure it out.

~HOW TO PLAY!~

Don't let the objects collide with each other! Use the buttons to create or destroy objects that are on the screen. If two Objects collide with each other the game is over and restarts the level. There is NO player feedback so you can fully concentrate yourself on pressing those buttons! There are totally no bugs and glitches that could make you go mad.

~BUGS?~

There are no bugs.

~ELSE~

Have fun ;).
